name: parachainsystem_upgraderestrictionsignal
description: An option which indicates if the relay-chain restricts signalling a validation code upgrade.  In other words, if this is `Some` and [`NewValidationCode`] is `Some` then the produced  candidate will be invalid.   This storage item is a mirror of the corresponding value for the current parachain from the  relay-chain. This value is ephemeral which means it doesn't hit the storage. This value is  set after the inherent.
